name: OrangeHack
description:
They said it couldn't be done, but one brave Orange has set out to compare itself against the Apples once and for all! Ascend a mazelike school campus slicing up apples to create the ultimate fruit bouquet.

Built with Godot Engine.

Controls
  • Move: WASD (North, West, South, East)
  • Attack: Move into an enemy.
  • Toggle Inventory: I
  • Toggle Menu: Escape
